spec_data.Name: perl-Text-Bidi-urxvt
spec_data.Description:
This extension filters the text displayed by Urxvt, so that Bi-directional
text (e.g., Hebrew or Arabic mixed with English) is displayed correctly.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Fri 09 Jun 2017 04:06:51 PM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Unicode bidirectional text support for urxvt
